title: I need a silent mouse
body: To play League in the back of the class because some of my Uni lectures are as useful as Fiora and Gangplank

replies.body:
Lol, tell the supervisor of that lecturer or something that they aren't being relevant.

If you don't have to be there, then don't be there.

Tell the Lecturer he's spewing very interesting shit but it doesn't relate to contemporary music.

What does your course entail? Is yours like a stage performance (Behind the Scenes) education? Or do you actually perform with contemporary singing/instrument styles?

lol I've been considering going up to the course coordinator and asking how this subject is relevant at all

and as for what my course entails, the latter. I'm a singer/songwriter
Listen to dem bloody lectures. Play league in your leisure time.

Learning about fucking Marxism in a Bachelor of Contemporary Music Performance course. These ideologies are interesting and can be beneficial to know but I went through this in High School and it has 0% relevance to my course. Fuckers aren't even bothering to link it to music.

lmao if i want to pass I'd have a better chance of doing so if I went to the lectures. and naaah man ive been at uni for 2 years now i was just really really bored in class and wanted to post something.

y u gotta be a dik 4 only corki god senpai master
lmao yes I am "TSM BjergWannabe" but i felt like a wanker with that name
I believe a working mouse would be quite gaming mouses are quite loud because they are super clicky.
